unnormalised: Mishra Ji from Patna nearly choked on his chai this morning. Turns out, someone applied for a loan using his PAN card, which he swears he keeps locked tighter than his daughter’s heart during shaadi season. Said loan applicant also used a fake voter ID! Police are investigating, but Mishra Ji’s already planning a pilgrimage to Tirupati – gotta cleanse the karma somehow.
normalised: Mishra Ji from Patna nearly choked on his chai this morning. Turns out, someone applied for a loan using his P-A-N card, which he swears he keeps locked tighter than his daughter’s heart during shaadi season. Said loan applicant also used a fake voter I-D! Police are investigating, but Mishra Ji’s already planning a pilgrimage to Tirupati – gotta cleanse the karma somehow.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, a hilarious mix-up happened at IIT Delhi. Apparently, two students, both named Rohan Sharma (classic!), accidentally swapped their admit cards. One had Enrollment Number IITD2024/CS/123, the other IITD2024/EE/456. Chaos ensued during the orientation until someone noticed the EE Rohan trying to code like a CS wizard. Talk about a major "type-o"!
normalised: Meanwhile, a hilarious mix-up happened at I-I-T Delhi. Apparently, two students, both named Rohan Sharma (classic!), accidentally swapped their admit cards. One had Enrollment Number I-I-T-D two thousand and twenty four slash C-S slash one hundred and twenty three, the other I-I-T-D two thousand and twenty four slash E-E slash four hundred and fifty six. Chaos ensued during the orientation until someone noticed the E-E Rohan trying to code like a C-S wizard. Talk about a major "type-o"!

unnormalised: And then there's poor Sunita from Bangalore. Got a job offer from "GlobalTech Solutions Pvt Ltd" but the offer letter just has the company's GST no: 29AABBCCDD1Z9. Now Sunita is wondering if she should join it or not!
normalised: And then there's poor Sunita from Bangalore. Got a job offer from "GlobalTech Solutions Private Limited" but the offer letter just has the company's G-S-T number: twenty nine A-A-B-B-C-C-D-D one Z nine. Now Sunita is wondering if she should join it or not!

unnormalised: In lighter news, someone tried to use Rahul Gandhi's Twitter account to claim benefits under the PMKVY scheme. The account listed a bogus Aadhaar number and a fake skill set, including "expert-level chai-making." The tweet was quickly deleted, but not before it became a meme.
normalised: In lighter news, someone tried to use Rahul Gandhi's Twitter account to claim benefits under the P-M-K-V-Y scheme. The account listed a bogus Aadhaar number and a fake skill set, including "expert-level chai-making." The tweet was quickly deleted, but not before it became a meme.

unnormalised: Moral of the story? Keep your IDs safer than your mother keeps her gold jewelry! And maybe, just maybe, double-check before accepting a job offer based solely on a GST number. Your bank account will thank you later.
normalised: Moral of the story? Keep your I-Ds safer than your mother keeps her gold jewelry! And maybe, just maybe, double-check before accepting a job offer based solely on a G-S-T number. Your bank account will thank you later.
